ygData.subject: Re: Questions about item locations
ygData.msgSnippet: Yes I can confirm that the Gnoll High Shamans often spawn with Runes Totem Staffs.  And Yes the Gnoll Embambers carry the Skell of Jhen Tra. Shadair J Axx 23rd
ygData.messageBody:
Yes I can confirm that the Gnoll High Shamans often spawn with Runes Totem
Staffs. And Yes the Gnoll Embambers carry the Skell of Jhen'Tra.

Shadair J'Axx
23rd Wizard
Karana

----- Original Message -----
From: <jeff_belcher@...>
To: <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
Sent: Monday, May 24, 1999 11:17 AM
Subject: [eq_wizards] Questions about item locations


> From: jeff_belcher@...
>
> Someone once posted that runed totem staves could be found in the Lake
Rathe zone,as well as in Paw. Can anyone confirm that runed totem staves are
in the Lake Rathe zone? If so, I assume they are at the gnoll skeleton camp.
Am I right?
>
>
>
> Also, are the gnoll embalmbers with the skull of Jhen Tra located at the
camp by the S Karanas/Lake Rathe zone?
>
>
>
> Thanks in advance for any assistance.
>
>
>
> Gantorek <Clan Cathar> of the Povar Server
>
